title: Language change
body: What i can do to change my language from English to Korean ? I can't change it anymore from "locale.cfg" or "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" , if i change them to ko_KR i get an error . Can someone say how i can change the language to Korean from Eune servers ?

replies.body: Each region has its own [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  It's not possible to select an unsupported language, and trying to do so could result in technical issues that we wouldn't be able to support.  Keep in mind that trying to adjust your files in a way to allow it would be at your own risk if you run into problems.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HhYwG5fi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-15T18:17:27.679+0000)
>
> Each region has its own [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  It's not possible to select an unsupported language, and trying to do so could result in technical issues that we wouldn't be able to support.  Keep in mind that trying to adjust your files in a way to allow it would be at your own risk if you run into problems.  Let me know if that clears things up!

On the old client it wasn't supported but we were still able to do it. Now it seems that the only languages that we can swap to are regions that we can transfer to. To me this implies that Riot is intentionally blocking us from swapping to languages of the 3rd party servers that they don't control, AKA Garena and Korean servers.
On the old launcher you could play on korean language . Anyway ,  thanks for help .
